name: part_001
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】hololive 3rd Generation Live#きゅるるん大作戦〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜【DAY1】 [cgvMVU2sO_U]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: A slideshow showcasing a vast collection of handwritten fan messages and illustrations for hololive 3rd Generation.
Performance of the song 'Kyururun Daisakusen' featuring a montage of fan-submitted short videos.

subtitles.original:
きゅるるん大作戦
〜最強アイドル、推すしかないでしょ〜
subtitles.english:
Operation Kyururun
~The Strongest Idols, You Can't Help But Stan Them~

subtitles.original: たくさんの素敵なショート動画ありがとうございました！ぜひ「あいあいあいあいにじゅー」をたくさん使って投稿してくださいね！
subtitles.english: Thank you for all the wonderful short videos! Please post lots of videos using "I-I-I-I-I Need You"!

subtitles.original: だーから　君のこと　大好き大好き大好き大好き大好き大好き　大好き
subtitles.english: So, I love you, love you, love you, love you, love you, love you, love you!

subtitles.original: 溢れるこの想い　きっと　もっと　止まらない
subtitles.english: These overflowing feelings, surely, more and more, won't stop!
